description: This file defines a Flask route for a health check endpoint using Flask-Smorest. It creates a Blueprint and a class-based view to handle GET requests at the root URL, returning a simple health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class that handles GET requests for health checking the application status.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests and returns a JSON indicating the application is healthy.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
